title: Service: Homeopathic Weight Loss | Orange, CA Chiropractor | Poole Chiropractic
description: If you're searching for Homeopathic Weight Loss in Orange, CA, then call Poole Chiropractic at (714) 282-6141.
cleaned_text: If you have been struggling with your weight for a long time, you may have a weight disorder. With the HCG homeopathic oral drops you will be able to reset your hypothalamus and metabolism so that you can maintain your weight. If you are serious about your weight loss, please read Dr. A.T.W. Simeone's "Pounds and Inches" manuscript twice by clicking on MANUSCRIPT below, and then make an appointment with Dr. Adam Poole to discuss the program and make sure it's the right product for you. Call us today to make an appointment for an evaluation at (714) 282-6141. Start losing weight fast and
